nodes.documentation:
Emitted when a relay server registers or updates its details
 Looking at these events lets a client discover relay servers
nodes.name: RelayServerRegistered

nodes.documentation: Emitted when relays are added by a relayManager
nodes.name: RelayWorkersAdded
TransactionRejectedByPaymaster

nodes.documentation:
Add new worker addresses controlled by sender who must be a staked Relay Manager address.
 Emits a RelayWorkersAdded event.
 This function can be called multiple times, emitting new events
nodes.name: addRelayWorkers
relayCall

nodes.documentation:
The fee is expressed as a base fee in wei plus percentage on actual charge.
 E.g. a value of 40 stands for a 40% fee, so the recipient will be
 charged for 1.4 times the spent amount.
nodes.name: calculateCharge

nodes.documentation: Returns the stake manager of this RelayHub.
nodes.name: stakeManager

nodes.documentation: Returns an account's deposits. It can be either a deposit of a paymaster, or a revenue of a relay manager.
nodes.name: balanceOf

nodes.documentation:
@dev the total gas overhead of relayCall(), before the first gasleft() and after the last gasleft().
Assume that relay has non-zero balance (costs 15'000 more otherwise).
nodes.name: gasOverhead

 Looking at these events lets a client discover relay servers

The fee is expressed as a base fee in wei plus percentage on actual charge.

attributes.documentation: Returns the stake manager of this RelayHub.

attributes.documentation: Returns an account's deposits. It can be either a deposit of a paymaster, or a revenue of a relay manager.

@dev the total gas overhead of relayCall(), before the first gasleft() and after the last gasleft().
Assume that relay has non-zero balance (costs 15'000 more otherwise).
attributes.name: gasOverhead

gasOverhead().details: the total gas overhead of relayCall(), before the first gasleft() and after the last gasleft(). Assume that relay has non-zero balance (costs 15'000 more otherwise).

params.approvalData: dapp-specific data forwarded to preRelayedCall.        This value is *not* verified by the Hub. For example, it can be used to pass a signature to the Paymaster
params.externalGasLimit: - the value passed as gasLimit to the transaction.     /// Emits a TransactionRelayed event.
params.relayRequest: - all details of the requested relayed call
params.signature: - client's EIP-712 signature over the relayRequest struct

addRelayWorkers(address[]).notice: Add new worker addresses controlled by sender who must be a staked Relay Manager address. Emits a RelayWorkersAdded event. This function can be called multiple times, emitting new events

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns an account's deposits. It can be either a deposit of a paymaster, or a revenue of a relay manager.

calculateCharge(uint256,(uint256,uint256.notice: The fee is expressed as a base fee in wei plus percentage on actual charge. E.g. a value of 40 stands for a 40% fee, so the recipient will be charged for 1.4 times the spent amount.

relayCall(uint256,((address,address,uint.notice: Relays a transaction. For this to succeed, multiple conditions must be met:  - Paymaster's "acceptRelayCall" method must succeed and not revert  - the sender must be a registered Relay Worker that the user signed  - the transaction's gas price must be equal or larger than the one that was signed by the sender  - the transaction must have enough gas to run all internal transactions if they use all gas available to them  - the Paymaster must have enough balance to pay the Relay Worker for the scenario when all gas is spent     /// If all conditions are met, the call will be relayed and the recipient charged.     /// Arguments:

stakeManager().notice: Returns the stake manager of this RelayHub.
